metadata.name: Innocent Joy
metadata.description:
A baby boy, so pure and bright
Smiling wide with all his might
His eyes aglow with innocence
As he looks out at the world, immense

His cherub face so full of glee
A vision of joy for all to see
His tiny hands reach out in play
As he explores the world, day by day

His smile is like a ray of light
That banishes all fear and night
His laughter like a sweetest song
That fills our hearts and makes us strong

Oh, precious boy, so full of grace
Your smile brightens up this place
You remind us of life's simple joys
And all the wonder that it employs

May you always keep that joyful grin
And let your spirit soar and spin
For in your smile, we see the truth
That love and happiness are proof
Of all that's good and pure and right
In this world, so full of light.

Hand Drew with Pastel 
Physical size: 65*45 cm
